EmailTemplate.name: 18-BG TO-Optical TDM renewal-Email-TDM email-T001ZZ.Email 01
EmailTemplate.subject: Migrate your TDM infrastructure without disrupting your network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> TDM renewal with Nokia 1830 ONE Protect legacy investments and deliver new services
Nokia helps you migrate to modern OTN/WDM transport without the wholesale replacement of your existing TDM infrastructure. Visit our site to find out how you can cut costs, boost revenues and meet new service expectations:
- Get an at-a-glance solution overview with our TDM renewal infographic <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/201673?did=d000000000cm&utm_campaign=optical_tdm_renewal&utm_source=email-list-aon-tech-summit-attendee-list-(opt-in)&utm_medium=email]]> - Check out our white paper <[[https://pages.nokia.com/19464.TDM-renewal-wp-v2.html?did=d000000000cm&utm_campaign=optical_tdm_renewal&utm_source=email-list-aon-tech-summit-attendee-list-(opt-in)&utm_medium=email]]> to learn how Nokia migrates TDM infrastructure - Determine how much your business can save with our TDM renewal savings calculator <[[https://onestore.nokia.com/story/72_1687/index.html?did=d000000000cm&utm_campaign=optical_tdm_renewal&utm_source=email-list-aon-tech-summit-attendee-list-(opt-in)&utm_medium=email]]> Read On!
Your Nokia Team Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
